pullrequest.title: More flexible build allowing for multi-version installation.

content.raw: The design of `ign-cmake` is pretty strongly tied to the format/style of the ignition projects, and it would require a considerable amount of tweaking to generalize it to work for sdformat. I wouldn't be opposed to doing that generalization, but it would take some time, and I don't think it's a high priority. If we have a working PR here, it might be good to move forward with it and then worry about bringing sdformat into the fold of `ign-cmake` at a later time.
